annotations.description: The Treacle is London barman Dick Bradsell's wonderful take on an Old Fashioned. I don't have an exact time and place on this one and since Bradsell sadly pa...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Treacle

textContent:
2oz. (60ml) Myers’s Rum
.25oz. (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
.5oz. (15ml) Apple Juice Float

Stir in glass over ice

title: Treacle
